name.baseName: East China Rice-Winter Wheat Production ; Agricultural Production (Wheat)
华东水稻-冬小麦生产 ; 农作生产(小麦)

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The energy consumption of agricultural production system is mainly calculated as the energy consumption generated by the use of diesel oil and pesticides. In this study, the energy consumption of agricultural materials and agricultural production system is mainly calculated through formula 1, and the consumption of fuel oil and electric power resources in the production stage of agricultural materials is referred to McDougall [22] et al. (Table 2 and Table 3). According to the research of Liu Hongtao et al. [23] (Table 4), the energy consumption of 1t urea (pure N) can be calculated. According to the urea (pure N) consumed per unit crop yield, the energy consumption of nitrogen fertilizer production in agricultural production system can be obtained. For the folding energy coefficients of diesel oil and pesticides in the agricultural stage, refer to the research results of Yuan Baorong et al. [24] (the folding energy coefficients of diesel oil and pesticide (kg·hm-2) are 42.55 and 1005.5 MJ·kg-1, respectively).

农作生产系统的能源消耗则主要计算柴油、 农药使用产生的能源消耗。本研究中，农资和农 作生产系统的能源消耗主要通过公式 1 进 行 运 算 ， 农 资 生 产 阶 段 的 柴 油 、 电力资源消耗量参见McDougall［22］等 研 究 ( 表 2 和 表 3 ) ; 依 据 刘 洪 涛 等［23］的研 究 ( 表 4) ，可 以 计 算 出 1t 尿 素 ( 纯 N) 的耗能 情 况，根据单位作物产量所消耗的尿素 ( 纯 N) ，可得出农资生产系统的氮肥生产产生的 能耗; 农作阶段的柴油、农药等折能系数参见袁 包荣等［24］研究成果( 柴油和农药( kg·hm－2 ) 的折 能系数分别 42. 55 和 100. 5 MJ·kg－1)

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: 1 ton of rice and 1 ton of winter wheat

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Using 1t rice and 1t winter wheat as functional units, the resource consumption and environmental impact of 1t rice and 1t winter wheat production in rice-wheat rotation system in this region were studied. The initial boundary of the life cycle of agricultural products is the extraction of energy raw materials related to the life cycle of rice and wheat, and the end boundary is the output of crop products and emission of waste gas through crop planting and cultivation to harvest, including two systems of agricultural material production and agricultural production
以 1t 水稻和 1t 冬小麦为 功能单位，研究该地区稻麦轮作系统生产 1t 水稻 和 1t 冬小麦的资源能耗与环境影响。农产品生命 周期的起始边界为与稻麦生命周期相关的能源原 料开采，终止边界为经过农作物种植栽培至收获 输出农作物产品和排放废气，具体包括农资生产 和农作生产两个系统
technology.technologicalApplicability: The results from this LCA data are specifically for the agricultural production processes of rice and winter wheat in the Jiangning District of Nanjing, Jiangsu Province. The data set reflects the resource inputs and outputs associated with cultivating these staples, adhering to the regional farming practices. This data can be used for environmental impact studies, process optimization, and sustainability assessments for crop production in similar geographical and climatological contexts. The materials involved, such as compound fertilizers, urea, imidacloprid, chlorpyrifos, butachlor, and haloxyfop, are indicative of the type of agrochemicals used in this region. The practice of mechanical straw crushing and returning to the field is also highlighted, which can be relevant for soil health and carbon cycling studies.

该生命周期评估(LCA)数据专门针对江苏省南京市江宁区的水稻和冬小麦农业生产过程。数据集反映了栽培这些主食作物所涉及的资源投入和产出，并遵循该地区的农业实践。这些数据可用于类似地理和气候条件下的作物生产环境影响研究、过程优化和可持续性评估。所涉及的材料，如复合肥、尿素、吡虫啉、氯�苯�磷、丁草胺和华星草克，是该地区农业化学品使用的指标。同样突出的是机械秸秆粉碎和还田的做法，这对土壤健康和碳循环研究可能具有相关性。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The starting boundary of the life cycle of agricultural products is the extraction of energy raw materials related to the life cycle of rice and wheat. The terminal boundary is the output of agricultural crop products and the emission of waste gases after the planting and cultivation of crops.
农产品生命周期的起始边界为与稻麦生命周期相关的能源原料开采, 终止边界为经过农作物种植栽培至收获输出农作物产品和排放废气

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The research data mainly come from the sampling survey results of the input-output of 82 households in Jiangning District, Nanjing City, Jiangsu Province over the past two years. The fertilizers mainly include compound fertilizers and urea, insecticides include imidacloprid and chlorpyrifos, and herbicides include butachlor and haloxyfop, etc. All straw in the field is mechanically crushed and returned to the field.
江苏省南京市江宁区82户农户近2年的投入产出抽样调查结果。化肥主要包括复合肥和尿素, 杀虫剂为氧化乐果和辛硫磷, 除草剂为丁草胺和华星草克等。田间秸秆全部采用机械粉碎还田
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: For the entire lifecycle of the product system, all input and output processes, as well as computational processes, generally include categorization and characterization, normalization, and weighted assessment
对产品系统整个生命周期所有输入与输出的过程及进行运算的过程, 一般包括分类和特征化、标准化和加权评估

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 胡乃娟,陈倩,朱利群.长江中下游稻-麦轮作系统生命周期环境影响评价——以江苏南京为例[J].长江流域资源与环境,2019,28(05):1111-1120.
胡乃娟,陈倩,朱利群.长江中下游稻-麦轮作系统生命周期环境影响评价——以江苏南京为例[J].长江流域资源与环境,2019,28(05):1111-1120.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: The results of a two-year input-output sampling survey of 82 households in Jiangning District, Nanjing City, Jiangsu Province.
江苏省南京市江宁区82户农户近2年的投入产出抽样调查结果
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for life cycle assessment, users should pay attention to the specific regional context and agricultural practices, as they significantly influence the data applicability and resulting analysis. The methodologies employed, such as mechanical straw crushing and the specific agrochemicals used, should be accounted for when comparing with other regions or agricultural systems. Users should also be aware of the defined boundaries of the life cycle – starting from raw energy material extraction and ending with the harvest of crops and emission of waste gases. These boundaries should be maintained when this data is integrated into broader studies or assessments to preserve its relevance and accuracy.
在使用该数据集进行生命周期评估时，用户应注意特定的区域背景和农业实践，因为这些因素显著影响数据的适用性和随后的分析结果。所采用的方法论，如机械秸秆粉碎和特定农药的使用，在与其他地区或农业系统比较时应予以考虑。用户还应意识到生命周期的定义边界——从能源原料的开采到作物的收获和废气的排放。将此数据整合到更广泛的研究或评估中时，应保持这些边界以保持其相关性和准确性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
